Summary: UFO was green and moved slowly with a few moments of hovering. no noise maybe a few hundred feet off the ground
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Worth
There were no other sightings in Lake Worth on or around July 22nd 2009
divs: sighting detailsi live in palm beach county and my front porch faces lake osborne which would be facing west. i was talking on my cell phone to a friend and first noticed it when i saw green shining from behind a tree which was blocking my vision. i kept moving to get a better view but it was moving east towards my direction anyway. when it moved to the point i could see all of it what i saw was definitly an object and it was glowing green in light. the movements were not that fast, it was moving at a sideways\forward motion and then it stopped moving and hovered over the john prince park campground. i watched the object that was shapped like a football without the points at the end for many minutes. my friend was still on the phone as i watched to see if it would move again and couldn't even speak while i watched entranced. the green lights seemed to get even brighter than before and after that i just felt fear and went into my house. in the following minutes i continued to look out my window, and perhaps the first three minutes i was in my house the object still remained hovered across the lake, then one time i looked and it was just gone. the whole time i heard no noise for it hovering pretty close.
